Package IO

Class getInputFromKeyboard

java.lang.Object
IO.getInputFromKeyboard
public class getInputFromKeyboard extends Object
This class reads text from a character-input stream, buffering characters so as to provide for the efficient reading of characters, arrays, and lines.
Version:
1.0.9
Author:
Danilo Basini
